articles.author: From NBA.com News Services
articles.title: Bucks guard Damian Lillard injures left leg, exits Game 4 - NBA
articles.description: Lillard is helped off the floor and into the locker room after suffering the non-contact injury in Game 4 against Indiana.
articles.content:
Damian Lillard suffers lower left leg injury in the 1st quarter and is ruled out for the rest of Game 4 vs. Pacers in Milwaukee.
Milwaukee Bucks guard Damian Lillard left Game 4 of an Eastern Confer… [+2945 chars]
